required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Concomitant Longitudinal Evaluation of Adalimumab With Methotrexate in the Real World: the CLEAR Study
clinical_study.official_title: Concomitant Longitudinal Evaluation of Adalimumab With Methotrexate in the Real World: the CLEAR Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of the use of the combination therapy adalimumab (ADA) every other week (EOW) with methotrexate (MTX) in suboptimal responders to ADA monotherapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving a satisfactory response based on investigator assessment
primary_outcome.description: Evaluated via the Investigator Satisfaction Questionnaire

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects achieving a satisfactory response based on subject self-assessment
primary_outcome.description: Evaluated via the Subject Satisfaction Questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects (primary and secondary sub-optimal responders) achieving reduction in PASI
Proportion of primary and secondary sub-optimal responders achieving a clinical response
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical response defined as a PGA of "Clear" or "Minimal".

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Dermatology Life Quality Index (DLQI) scores
secondary_outcome.description: DLQI questionnaire will be completed by all subjects.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of primary sub-optimal responders achieving reduction in PASI
Proportion of secondary sub-optimal responders achieving reduction in PASI

arm_group.description: Single Arm- all patients will receive adalimumab and methotrexate

facility.name: Kirk Barber Research, Calgary, Alberta, Canada /ID# 126518
Dr. Melinda Gooderham Medicine Professionnale Corporation /ID# 126773
